name: Pyodine 0.5 g gel
description: Povidone-iodine is an antiseptic used for skin disinfection before and after surgery. Povidone-iodine topical is available in many different forms, such as a liquid, ointment, mouth spray, swab, and soap. Povidone-iodine is also used for minor wounds. Povidone-iodine topical is used inside the mouth as a mouth spray to provide temporary relief of minor mouth pain or irritation, sore throat, or canker sore pain.
label: medicine
